Series.Actors: |Matt Ryan|Angélica Celaya|Charles Halford|Harold Perrineau|Emmett J. Scanlan |Michael James Shaw|
Series.Overview: Based on the DC Comics series "Hellblazer", this series focuses on seasoned Demon Hunter and Master of The Occult John Constantine, a Dark Magician who is struggling with his past sins as he tries to protect humanity from a gathering supernatural threat. Constantine specializes in giving Hell…hell. Armed with a ferocious knowledge of The Dark Arts and his wickedly naughty dry British wit, he fights against the forces of Darkness.
